paper_abstract: We describe a cloud-based infrastructure that we have developed that is optimized for wide area, high performance networks and designed to support data mining applications. The infrastructure consists of a storage cloud called Sector and a compute cloud called Sphere. We describe two applications that we have built using the cloud and some experimental studies. (C) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Compute and storage clouds using wide area high performance networks
